title: Roja Ratan Jhumka: Ruby and Polki Diamond Earrings
features: Classic Jhumka design with a vibrant ruby cabochon as the focal point. Features an intricate flower-shaped polki diamond setting beneath. The earrings showcase exceptional Hyderabadi craftsmanship, highlighting the natural beauty of uncut diamonds. The setting around the cabochon is meticulously crafted with a beaded gold accent.
occasions: or any special occasion where a touch of traditional elegance is desired. Perfectly complements silk sarees and traditional South Indian attire.
description: Exquisite craftsmanship ensures heirloom quality. The use of natural ruby and uncut polki diamonds offers a unique, timeless beauty. The Roja Ratan Jhumka seamlessly blends traditional design with contemporary style, making it a versatile addition to any jewelry collection. Experience the heritage of Hyderabadi jewelry making.
